name: PRST
0:
”Alexa, ask Life's Pursuit to tell me about the company”
”Alexa, ask Life's Pursuit to tell me about the founder”
”Alexa, ask Life's Pursuit to play the latest update”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: life's pursuit
Developer Terms of Use
des:
PRST pronounced “pursuit” was created to encourage people to pursue their passions, experiment in life, and minimize regrets.
Founded by Justin Castelli.

Learn more: prst.co

You can say:
Alexa, open Life's Pursuit.
Alexa, ask Life's Pursuit to tell me about the company.
Alexa, ask Life's Pursuit to tell me about Justin Castelli.
Alexa, ask Life's Pursuit to tell me about the Founder.
Alexa, ask Life's Pursuit to tell me about The P.
Alexa, ask Life's Pursuit to tell me about The R.
Alexa, ask Life's Pursuit to tell me about The S.
Alexa, ask Life's Pursuit to tell me about The T.
Alexa, ask Life's Pursuit to play the latest update.

Follow PRST:
Instagram: @lifesprst
Twitter: @LifesPRST
Blog: mirror.xyz/prst.eth

Request a demo to launch your hands-free homepage and podcast on Alexa: WealthVoice.ai
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
